title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class. The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method with a Set of Class objects in the parameter, the output is "MySomeClass".
EB: However, I expect the output to be "MySomeClass". This behavior is not in line with the Servlet 3.0 specification. In Glassfish 3.0, my code works fine.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Run the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method with a Set of Class objects in the parameter.
2. Check the output, it should be "MySomeClass".
